text: @amirkhani.mohammad_ Thanks for the question. Vicki and her team are doing research in Northern Saskatchewan to try and better understand how and when the rich uranium deposits formed in the area. For more information, I would encourage you to read the following article that she was interviewed for: http://ow.ly/svgL30dMSTG
Field work is totally worth it for the science.
Hello dear colleague, Could you talk about your work that you've done on the field???? Tnx
